verses.verse: Now in the first<WH259> year<WH8141> of Cyrus<WH3566> king<WH4428> of Persia<WH6539>, that the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> by the mouth<WH6310> of Jeremiah<WH3414> might be fulfilled<WH3615>, the LORD<WH3068> stirred up<WH5782> the spirit<WH7307> of Cyrus<WH3566> king<WH4428> of Persia<WH6539>, that he made a proclamation<WH5674><WH6963> throughout all his kingdom<WH4438>, and put it also in writing<WH4385>, saying<WH559>,

Thus saith<WH559> Cyrus<WH3566> king<WH4428> of Persia<WH6539>, The LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of heaven<WH8064> hath given<WH5414> me all the kingdoms<WH4467> of the earth<WH776>; and he hath charged<WH6485> me to build<WH1129> him an house<WH1004> at Jerusalem<WH3389>, which is in Judah<WH3063>.

Who is there among you of all his people<WH5971>? his God<WH430> be with him, and let him go up<WH5927> to Jerusalem<WH3389>, which is in Judah<WH3063>, and build<WH1129> the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, (he is the God<WH430>,) which is in Jerusalem<WH3389>.

And whosoever remaineth<WH7604> in any place<WH4725> where he sojourneth<WH1481>, let the men<WH582> of his place<WH4725> help<WH5375> him with silver<WH3701>, and with gold<WH2091>, and with goods<WH7399>, and with beasts<WH929>, beside the freewill offering<WH5071> for the house<WH1004> of God<WH430> that is in Jerusalem<WH3389>.

¶ Then rose up<WH6965> the chief<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1> of Judah<WH3063> and Benjamin<WH1144>, and the priests<WH3548>, and the Levites<WH3881>, with all them whose spirit<WH7307> God<WH430> had raised<WH5782>, to go up<WH5927> to build<WH1129> the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> which is in Jerusalem<WH3389>.

And all they that were about<WH5439> them strengthened<WH2388> their hands<WH3027> with vessels<WH3627> of silver<WH3701>, with gold<WH2091>, with goods<WH7399>, and with beasts<WH929>, and with precious things<WH4030>, beside all that was willingly offered<WH5068>.

¶ Also Cyrus<WH3566> the king<WH4428> brought forth<WH3318> the vessels<WH3627> of the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068>, which Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> had brought forth<WH3318> out of Jerusalem<WH3389>, and had put<WH5414> them in the house<WH1004> of his gods<WH430>;

Even those did Cyrus<WH3566> king<WH4428> of Persia<WH6539> bring forth<WH3318> by the hand<WH3027> of Mithredath<WH4990> the treasurer<WH1489>, and numbered<WH5608> them unto Sheshbazzar<WH8339>, the prince<WH5387> of Judah<WH3063>.
And this is the number<WH4557> of them: thirty<WH7970> chargers<WH105> of gold<WH2091>, a thousand<WH505> chargers<WH105> of silver<WH3701>, nine<WH8672> and twenty<WH6242> knives<WH4252>,
Thirty<WH7970> basons<WH3713> of gold<WH2091>, silver<WH3701> basons<WH3713> of a second<WH4932> sort four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> and ten<WH6235>, and other<WH312> vessels<WH3627> a thousand<WH505>.

All the vessels<WH3627> of gold<WH2091> and of silver<WH3701> were five<WH2568> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred<WH3967>. All these did Sheshbazzar<WH8339> bring up<WH5927> with them of the captivity<WH1473> that were brought up<WH5927> from Babylon<WH894> unto Jerusalem<WH3389>.
